thread.title: The Voice fans have noticed something VERY strange about the judges this series
thread.title_full: The Voice fans have noticed something VERY strange about the judges this series

author: Vicki Newman
title: The Voice fans have noticed something VERY strange about the judges this series
text:
The Voice fans have noticed something VERY strange about the judges this series Viewers have questioned why the judges haven't changed their clothes yet Share Don't The Voice judges ever change their clothes?   
Fans of The Voice have noticed something very odd about the judges - they haven't changed their clothes all series! 
The show, which moved from BBC to ITV this year, has been on for weeks after kicking off in January. 
But each week that blind auditions have been shown - with those famous spinning chairs - judges Jennifer Hudson, will.i.am, Gavin Rossdale and Sir Tom Jones have been wearing exactly the same outfits. 
Viewers of the show have been left baffled as to why the judges - and presenter Emma Willis - have been in the same clothes throughout the entire series so far. Read More The judges never change their clothes (Photo: Rex Features) That's a lot of pressure to get your outfit right (Photo: Rex Features) 
Fans are wondering if the scores of blind auditions are all filmed in one (very long) day, while others just said they hope the judges have been washing their clothes before wearing them again every Saturday. 
People took to Twitter to find out if anyone knew what was going on with the programme's wardrobe department. 
One said: "Very disturbing how The voice judges never change clothes... was this all filmed in one day?" Viewers wondered if all the blind auditions were filmed in one day (Photo: Rex Features) will.i.am and Jennifer must really love those outfits (Photo: Rex Features) 
"please can someone explain WHY the judges and presenters wear the same clothes every week??," another asked. 
"The Voice judges have failed to change their clothes all series # thevoiceuk # thevoiceuk # changeyourclothes," said another viewer. 
One fan wondered: "I don't get why # TheVoice coaches wear the same clothes every week 6 episodes of blind auditions cant have been done in 1 day" Viewers couldn't understand why they never changed (Photo: Rex Features) There's actually a very good reason why (Photo: Rex Features) Video Loading Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now
